member.name: WS_FIELD_DESCRIPTION
member.summary: Represents serialization information about a field within a structure.

member.name: WS_FIELD_DESCRIPTION.mapping
member.summary: Identifies how the field maps to the XML. See for the ways that the field can be exposed in the XML content.

summary.para: The XML local name to use for the field.

This field is required, except in the following case, where it may be NULL. If the mapping field is , then this identifies the local name of the "wrapper" element that is the parent element of the array item elements. Setting this field (and the ns field) to NULL will omit the wrapper element. The ns and localName fields must be either both specified or both NULL.
The XML namespace to use for the field.

This field is required, except in the following case, where it may be NULL. If the mapping field is , then this identifies the namespace of the "wrapper" element that is the parent element of the array item elements. Setting this field (and the localName field) to NULL will omit the wrapper element. The ns and localName fields must be either both specified or both NULL.

member.name: WS_FIELD_DESCRIPTION.type
member.summary: The type of the field. See for a list of supported types.

member.name: WS_FIELD_DESCRIPTION.typeDescription
member.summary: Additional information about the type. Each type has a different description structure. This may be NULL, depending on the .

member.name: WS_FIELD_DESCRIPTION.offset
member.summary: The offset of the field within the containing structure.

member.name: WS_FIELD_DESCRIPTION.options
member.summary: Additional flags for the field. See for a list of flags. If no flags are needed, this may be 0.

member.name: WS_FIELD_DESCRIPTION.defaultValue
member.summary:
Points to a default value for the field. This is used in the following instances:
was specified, and the XML did not contain the value.
was specified.
If defaultValue is NULL, then it is the same as having a default value of all zero's.

summary.para: The structure offset of the ULONG field that represents the number of items in the array.

This field is used when using or array types (, WS_UTF8_ARRAY_TYPE, WS_BYTE_ARRAY_TYPE).
In other cases, it does not need to be specified (it can be 0).
The XML local name to use for the repeating elements when using .
In other cases this field does not need to be specified (it can be NULL).
The XML namespace to use for the repeating elements when using .
In other cases this field does not need to be specified (it can be NULL).

The minimum and maximum number of repeating elements that may appear when using ,WS_REPEATING_ELEMENT_CHOICE_FIELD_MAPPING, or WS_REPEATING_ANY_ELEMENT_FIELD_MAPPING. If not specified (NULL), the minimum is 0, and the maximum is MAX ULONG.
In other cases this field does not need to be specified (it can be NULL).
